members.joinCircumstances: Founded the crew to take over Fish-Man Island and promote fish-man supremacy.
One of Hody's loyal officers from the Fish-Man District.

keyMoments.title: New Fish-Man Pirates Officers Begin Their Rampage
keyMoments.description: The officers advance toward Gyoncorde Plaza while devastating different districts of Fish-Man Island, demonstrating their individual destructive capabilities.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the full scope of the threat facing Fish-Man Island as all officers display their unique abilities.

keyMoments.title: Hody's Energy Steroid Transformation
keyMoments.description: Captain Hody Jones transforms into his most powerful form after overdosing on Energy Steroids, becoming the crew's ultimate weapon.
keyMoments.significance: The transformation represents the peak of the New Fish-Man Pirates' power and threat level.

bases.description: The crew's home base in the Fish-Man District
Temporarily occupied during their takeover attempt

jollyRoger.description: A shark skull with two crossed tridents
